translations: v.使生动，使兴奋；把……制作成动画；鼓动，激励；使有生命

sentences.sentence: There was precious little about the cricket to animate the crowd.
sentences.translation: 这场板球比赛极少有让观众兴奋的地方。

sentences.sentence: Shaffer's great gift lies in his ability to animate ideas theatrically.
sentences.translation: 谢弗的天赋在于他能把想法在戏剧上表现出来。

sentences.sentence: Natural philosophy involved the study of all aspects of the material world, animate and inanimate.
sentences.translation: 自然哲学涉及到了对包括有生命体与无生命体的物质世界的全面研究。
